content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-86.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- 4 Wooden chests at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), (40.5,-87.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)
All connected to mine and store coal

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0)
- Burner inserter at (-25.5,-58.5) 
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5)
Connected via transport belts

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-6 to -10, y=-57 to -60)
Consists of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Multiple burner inserters connecting drills to chests
Connected via transport belts

### Smelting Line at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters connecting chests to furnaces
Connected via transport belts

### Power Generation at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17.5 to 27.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Connected via pipes and carrying water/steam
- Electric poles connecting power to a lab

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting items
- Must be within reach distance of the target chest/entity before attempting to extract items
- Verify the chest contains the items you want to extract

### Errors when inserting fuel
- Ensure you have the fuel item (coal) in your inventory before attempting to insert into burner devices
- Check if the target device has space in its fuel inventory

### Entity placement errors
- Check for space availability before placing entities
- Ensure proper clearance around entities that require multiple tiles

### Fluid system connection errors
- Ensure pipes are properly connected between fluid producers and consumers
- Check that boilers have both water input and steam output connections
